column3: “Picked up some 303 Kush from Livwell on Evans and I love this strain. def a strain I will be keeping close. I'm more of an indica smoker since I've suffered with Anxiety and Panic attacks for years now and this strain didn't trigger any not even anxiousness which is a major plus! Good night time/relax smoke. tried a wake and bake with it and had my ass on sleep mode all day so not a day time strain unless you aren't ...”

“Seeing 303 is on the menu for $35 1/8th, I immediately ask to see the Colorado classic for the first time. Inhaling out of the jar, my nose is greeted with woody aromas, with the terpenes displaying some earthy/musky undertones on the end of the scent. It's like Ron Swanson in the forest, felling a great evergreen tree. In your nose. 
The appearance is typical hybrid. Though to note specifics, it's leaves are a mediu...”
“303 is a nice smoke. really enjoyable. chemdawg effect to start you off, then slowly tapper in the pre 98 and there you go. would recommend to anyone looking to expand their pallet.”
“Tastes great, hits smooth and you fall into euphoria quickly yet calmly. using it for Epilepsy”
“ya boy high as hell them fire backwoods”
“Awesome pain relief! It does do wonders for finishing the day with relaxation!”
“Picked up some of this 303 Kush from Livwell Lakewood. Took two good hits when I got home and had to get a ride back to the shop so i could buy the rest. Great smoke, tasty, in my Top 10.”

“Effects: Head high cures migranes/headaches, eye pressure, nausea, helps relax your body, crushed my anxiety, depression, PTSD, and like others have stated this is a very social bud. I owever didn't find it to have much physical pain relief. Flavor: get ready this is a rollercoaster, but by vaporizing I picked up in this order, a floral woodyness with cheesy/yeasty lemony/citrus. Hard to explain unless Vaped but outs...”

“Found this to be a very enjoyable smoke, one you smoke for the enjoyment of it, if that makes sense...like a cigar. Very social bud for an indica, very heady which is great for migrane/headache relief and didn't find it to be sedating. I found no paranoia in fact quite the opposite. This squashed my PTSD, anxiety, and depression. Overall very minor pain relief in physical form. If your in pain I recommend accompanyin...”

“2oz. to 1lb. of butter Ratio. Working good for background pain, relaxation and nausea with minimal anxiety and hunger cravings. Organic flavor profile competes somewhat with peanut butter and chocolate and pairs well with pistachio and apple.”
“Very relaxing high..perfect bud for the end of a days work.”

“I decided to give this strain a try after seeing it on special at Livwell Evans. I'm a veteran hippie (hey, I admit it) that typically prefers a nice Sativa to spark the creative juices, but I also suffer from a number of issues, including severe anxiety and insomnia. I decided to pick this up to kick insomnia square in the tuckus.

Methods used were smoking and vaporizing. Very piney scent - you can smell this from ...”
“I'm not from Denver but Life Flower has truly made me feel like I'm home and welcome..😜😜😜”

“303 glued me to the couch. Very relaxing and euphoric. Very calm and cheerful. Great choice for adjusting mood and attitude. It also helps with minor pain in my hip related to nerve damage. It does cause a little dizzyness.”
“Very Nice! Was looking for Bubba and this was a nice alternative for time being but a very nice taste and clean buzz!”

“303 or trinidad og absolutely is an amazing strain with a bit of a sweetness to the smoke.
with a gradual high, great ride, and no paranoia or downer type side effects.  totally impressed with this flower.”
“I'm not from Denver but Life Flower has truly made me feel like I'm home and welcome..😜😜😜”
“Very Nice! Was looking for Bubba and this was a nice alternative for time being but a very nice taste and clean buzz!”

“303 or trinidad og absolutely is an amazing strain with a bit of a sweetness to the smoke.
with a gradual high, great ride, and no paranoia or downer type side effects.  totally impressed with this flower.”
“I like good indicas and while i didn't think this had much flavor the potency definetly set in with a nice bubba heady high”
“I smoked 2 grams of this and let me tell you...I never slept that good during the day”

“Tastes so good, if you like OG kush, bubba kush, chemdawg, or any of the original hard hitting west coast strains then you'll love this stuff. Got from livwell in Denver, I definitely recommend it to anyone, just such a nice relaxing high and such a great pure flavor”
“great”

“Thanks to Riley W at the Broadway LivWell for suggesting this amazing strain while we were listing to his sick playlist as always! And to the point... I use this stain primarily to end my day and for playing the Pokemon Online TCG along with some minecraft. It has a heavy, ,time stoping affect, but not a crazy tripped out heavy high I sill can talk clearly and hold a Conversation”

“Just vaped this in my crafty, love it. More calming strain. No anxiety which is good. It reminds me of the purple cotton strain. Can tell its a strain for after work or just decompressing. Some strains get you hyped up like you just took adderall or something, this is more of a single beer type strain. Just relaxed. Wife told me to write that she's straight chilling."”"
“Hands down one of my favorite so far, just smoked a bowl and I'm flying!”
“Stuff was able to keep me blasted for hours. I make my own vape juice from concentrate and this gave a great euphoria that didn’t lead to mania.”

“I tried vaping it with juice I make myself (1 gram of wax for 2ml of PG)

Instantaneous high and keeps you blasted.”
“It's all in the name baby.. 303" now this idea was crazy Chem x 98' pre bubba kush. Very powerful flower. Truly will knock your dick in the dirt!”"
“Very tasty nugs. I want more, I want more!  Seasoned smoker here and I must say this is one of my top 5 right now. Beautiful and taste great!  Don’t hesitate.”
“would totally recommend this to anyone whos had a long day and wants to lift there spirits.”
“I really like this strain to relax my body and help me wind down at the end of the day. I must say it makes me want to melt in my couch!!”
“not awful, just nothing to make me come back for more.  pleasant enough, but short duration.”

“I snagged some 303og from northern lights cannabis club and enjoyed it thoroughly. However i am not sure i got true 303og based off other reviews and the description. Mine taste like a grape strain very much like the grape ape i snagged at l'eagle. I'll upload some pics soon.”
“Not quite as potent as I would like. But other than that good stuff!”
“it's nice i have p t s d it's a good high”
“The call upon the munchies!!! Enough said...”
“I have stomach based anxiety. This was the secind best med I've ever tried for it.  Relaxed but still energetic. 22 yr smoker”
“My second favorite strain at the moment.  I have physical stomach anxiety and this helps while making everything seem wonderful.  Uplifting and euphoric”
“great for doing stuff during the day and getting stuff​ done i felt medicated through out the day”

“I give this one 4 stars only because the first time I tried it, I had a bad experience. I have anxiety and sleep disorder. I tried this strain and the onset was very fast. the problem is it made my heart feel like it was racing. I honestly thought in my head I was going to have a heart attack and die. This made my anxiety even worse! I was able to calm myself down by pacing around my living room until the fast heartb...”
“it's a great high, but I seemed to get very tired pretty quickly after smoking it. I would pair this with a sativa and smoke both together for an uplifted, aware high.”
“So. I just smoked this and watched The Flash. Straight up gave me the feels and I cried like a baby. Wtf is up with that...”
“Not super great. But not bad ither. It seems to be good for insomnia but as for anxiety, I dont find it very helpful in my case.”
“good tasting pine and earthy strain and pretty nice fully body high.”

“I really like this strain. Yeah, it's not going to put you into orbit, but it has an aftertaste that reminds me on fruit loops and gives me a mellow and relaxing high. Good night time strain that will certainly help with insomnia and will ease your stress.  if you have had a rough day, light up some 303 and Fuhgettabout it! This is certainly my favorite for chillin'.”
“Good at the end of a day. Smooth smoke, great taste.”
“I got this a wax concentrate.  It has a very good flavor, woodsy with a slight citrus flavor.  Puts me in a good mood.  This would great with a straight sativa, I could get allot of stuff done.”

“good relaxed high. Kind of a combination of mostly happy and relaxed. Good way to take the edge off, but if your looking to get fucked up this isn't your strain. You also get pretty damn tired at the end. You can get pretty angsty smoking this but it passes.”
“Really great smoke, can't go wrong!”

“I've smoked probably hundreds of strains in the past few years, this is the first one that had me feeling humorous and happy. I suffer from clinical depression and i was laughing at shows and movies (something i havent done for years) It improves mood, very relaxing. This is one i will definitely frequently use, and highly recomend.”
“Thank you Freedom Road in Trinidad for hooking me up with this killer strain during happy hour. I love this strain. It's really potent and relaxing. I love the heavy indica.”
“best ⛽ I've had in a while...”
“I don't believe it's true ocean grown.”
“303 is harsh AF but it goes straight to the head and get you high instantly...love this strain”
“Great genetics strong economic grow.”

“It's a 5-star in terms of potency. Rec shop said this is an 80/20 indica dom but it def felt more to me like 70/30 or 60/40 indica. Great bud, just didn't expect such sativa properties in it. 
And this particular batch was not flushed thoroughly enough before harvest. Rough smoke and sizzling cherry. Top shelf too.”

“Picked up a half oz at natural alternatives in fort collins. Was recommended by the budtender. Great pine taste. Diesel smell. Very potent taste on inhale. High isnt really strong enough mentally for me personally unless i smoke say 2 bowls. Probably a great strain in a low stress situation but not a constantly stressful environment.  Overall it's a good strain and very flavorful.”
“Gives a fast head high, but only lasts 30-40 minutes, followed by insane munchies and a nap.”

“I got this as a concentrate in Denver at LivWell on Broadway.  I found that this is a great strain to put with a really hyper sativa like Zeta Sage #1 from the same dispensary.  It gives you a very good creative and hyper feeling where you just want to get some creative shit DONE!  Granted, I'm into the Dewars a little too, I'm guess I'm saying the three are a good combo.”
“Perfect for celebrating”
“nice burn, good flavor. relaxing high”

“From The Clinic Colorado, says it's Kosher Kush x Ghost OG...
Super tasty! Has a sweet (honey/berry/caramel?) twang on top of classic Kush fuel" aroma from my PAX vaporizer (get one). Heavy indica body stone but with lighter
column5: introspective head high. Cried most of the way through a Planet Earth II episode cuz it was so beautiful. Eliminates pain
